titles.title: Aiding Social Services in States Temporarily Act of 2008
To increase funding for the program of block grants to States for social services.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Income Security and Family Support.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 1/23/2008--Introduced. Aiding Social Services in States Temporarily Act of 2008 - Amends title XX (Block Grants to States for Social Services) of the Social Security Act to increase FY2008 funding for the social services block grant program.
